duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides professional nursing skills in a defined outpatient clinic setting. Provides patient care activities to patients of diverse ages as assigned.
Demonstrates ability to recognize and assess urgent/emergency needs of patients and initiate appropriate emergency procedures as needed.
Follows clinic procedure/protocol for the organization and management of the electronic medical record. Acts to facilitate interdisciplinary communication.
Assesses learning needs of the patient and significant others. Gives accurate and complete information to patients and family.
Assists with a variety of procedures, exams and/or operation of diagnostic equipment as assigned.

Applies professional nursing skills in the provision of preventive health maintenance and treatment of ill and injured patients utilizing the four aspects of the nursing process: assessment, planning, implementation and evaluation.

education_certification.credential: Possession of a current RN License
Basic Life Support (BLS) for the Healthcare Provider certified or obtained within three (3) months of hire
